name: City Drive Simulator
summary: Experience the thrill of high-speed urban driving in City Drive Simulator! Explore a futuristic cyberpunk city, drift through neon-lit streets, and master tight corners on a dynamic open-world highway. With realistic physics, immersive environments, and stunning night visuals, feel the adrenaline of fast-paced racing. Customize your car, compete in challenges, and become the ultimate street racer. Are you ready to conquer the city roads?
